channel.title: About the OGM Connections category
channel.description:
OGM is trying, as much as possible, to be a bridge, a catalyst, a connector. There are already [many communities around the world](https://bra.in/7jL4YN) that are building components of OGM.
How should we approach them? What is our offer to them? How do we integrate what they've created?

item.title: About the OGM Connections category
item.dc:creator: Technoshaman
item.description:
@Jerry, methinks the beautiful service-orientation reflected in your questions can be more fruitfully addressed after we make some substantive progress in addressing:

What is the offer of OGM to its members?
How do we federate what we’ve created and are creating?

Read full topic
